snippet: Thousands of foreign laborers turned themselves over to the Saudi authorities after protests over a Saudi campaign against illegal immigrants led to the deaths of two people.
abstract: Thousands of foreign laborers turn themselves over to the authorities in Saudi Arabia to be sent to their home countries after a night of protests in which one foreigner and one Saudi are killed; protests are directed against Saudi campaign to arrest and deport illegal immigrants who were given until last week to get valid work permits or leave the country.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of foreign laborers turned themselves over to the Saudi authorities after protests over a Saudi campaign against illegal immigrants led to the deaths of two people.

headline.main: After Clashes With Saudis, Laborers Opt to Go Home
headline.print_headline: After Clashes With Saudis, Laborers Opt To Go Home
